tool_name: Returns company info based on the website
tool_description: This tool provides detailed information about a company based on its website, including the company's name, description, CEO information, links to social media platforms, headquarters location, and top competitors.

api_list.name: getCompanyByWebsite
api_list.description: Fetches company information by providing a valid website domain. Invalid domains will result in exceptions, and subdomains will be stripped from the input.

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: The main domain of the company website to retrieve information for.
